main event: A brilliant white light was observed in the sky above Richmond, Indiana on November 5, 1948, lasting for approximately 20 minutes.
interesting points: The light was reported to appear larger than a normal star,Two telephone calls were made to The Palladium-Item alerting them of the light,The observer noted the light flickered and changed in brightness,The observer initially thought the light might be a flare hanging from a parachute,The incident attracted attention from local authorities and was reported to the Air Force for investigation.
sighted object: a brilliant white light in the sky
witness description: A sports writer at The Palladium-Item who had prior contact and was known to be trustworthy.
